author: gdaniels
msg: Add default 30 second timeout for HTTP connection pool starvation.  Without this we can get into a situation where we lock up forever - with this we at least throw a reasonable exception after a bit.

author: gdaniels
msg: Add call to options.setCallTransportCleanup(true) when using ServiceClients inside STSClient.  This makes sure that we clean up the underlying HTTPMethod correctly and therefore don't lose connections from the shared pool.  Note that this forces a complete Axiom build, but only on the STS messages, not user-level ones.
Also a little cleanup and refactoring of the RampartTest tests - more needs doing here.

author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-1149 Synchronized access to FC next() method

author: trawick
msg: Fix handling of the request body when a FastCGI access checker/
authenticator/authorizer (AAA) was configured.  The body wasn't available
Submitted by: Jeff Trawick and Barry Scott <barry.scott onelan.co.uk>
